Class-Champion 20 -- Female Half-Elf Champion: 20

Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Pharasma (N)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Auspicious Mount: Mount is a specialized animal companion with Pharasma's mark, Skill Expert (Religion), speech, +2 Intelligence, and +1 Wisdom
Champion Feats: 11 selections
Champion Key Ability: 1 selection
Champion's Code: 1 selection
Champion's Reaction: Has the Glimpse Of Redemption feature
Clever Improviser: Has Untrained Improvisation feature
Deity And Cause: 1 selection
Divine Ally: 2 selections
General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Second Ally: +1 selection
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Adopted Ancestry (Halfling): May take Halfling ancestry feats
Celestial Form: Has a celestial form with Darkvision and flight
Celestial Mount: Mount has a celestial form with Darkvision, +40 Hit Points, weakness 10 to evil damage, and flight
Divine Ally (Steed): Has a mount as a young animal companion
Dragonslayer Oath: Must attempt to slay evil dragons whenever possible
Fiendsbane Oath: Must attempt to banish or slay fiends whenever possible
Imposing Destrier: Mount is a nimble or savage animal companion and may Stride or Strike without a command
Liberator: Must always respect others' freedom and oppose tyranny
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Loyal Warhorse: Mount is mature and will never attack self
Paladin: Must always act with honor and respect lawful authority
Redeemer: Must always show compassion for others and attempt to redeem the wicked
Sense Evil: Can detect the presence of powerful evil auras (Deception vs. Perception neg)
Shining Oath: Must attempt to put undead to rest whenever possible
The Tenets Of Good: May not commit anathema or evil acts, harm innocents, or allow harm to come to innocents through inaction
Vengeful Oath: Must hunt down and exterminate creatures who have committed atrocities whenever possible
Perception: +29 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:

Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Absalom Lore): May forgo rolling a Absalom Lore check for an automatic 34
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes; may provide for self and 4 others (x2 with a critical success)
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 43 (dexterity (1 max); legendary) Class DC: Champion: 40 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 7; HP 40) Weapons: Dagger (+30 1d6+4 P/S R10'; strength; master); Morningstar (+30 1d6+4 B/P; strength; master); Sling (+30 1d6+2 B R50'; dexterity; master)
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Aura Of Vengeance: Reduces allies' penalty on Strikes in response to Retributive Strike to -2
Champion Expertise: Class Expert (Champion)
Champion Mastery: Class Master (Champion)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Deific Weapon: +1 damage die step on Dagger
Deity And Cause: Attack Trained (Dagger)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Divine Ally (Shield): +2 shield hardness/+50% shield Hit Points
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Legendary Armor: Defense Legendary (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Shield Paragon: +50% shield Hit Points
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Armor Expertise: May use the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) May make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Aura Of Faith: R15' All self Strikes and the first Strike of each ally each rd inflict +1 HP good damage vs. evil creatures
Blade Of Justice: (2) May add two extra damage dice on a Strike vs. an evil foe and convert all damage to good, as well as inflicting Retributive Strike effects
Deific Weapon: Has access to deity weapon (Dagger)
Divine Ally (Blade): May apply choice of disrupting, ghost touch, returning, or shifting to a weapon chosen each day; also gains critical specialization effect
Divine Grace: (R) May gain +2 save vs. a spell
Divine Reflexes: May use an additional Reaction for Champion's Reaction 1/turn
Divine Smite (Liberator): Liberating Step inflicts 4 HP persistent good damage on a foe who restrains an ally
Divine Smite (Paladin): Retributive Strike inflicts 4 HP persistent good damage
Divine Smite (Redeemer): Glimpse Of Redemption inflicts 4 HP persistent good damage on a target who responds with damage
Divine Wall: Adjacent spaces are difficult terrain for foes
Dragonslayer Oath: Glimpse Of Redemption grants 27 damage resistance when used with an evil dragon
Exalt (Liberator): R15' Liberating Step allows all allies to Step if target ally does not attempt to break free
Exalt (Paladin): R15' Retributive Strike allows allies a -2 melee Strike against target
Exalt (Redeemer): R15' May use Glimpse Of Redemption to grant allies 20 damage resistance
Fiendsbane Oath: Glimpse Of Redemption grants 27 damage resistance when used with a fiend
Glimpse Of Redemption: (R) R15' May negate damage to a struck ally or grant the ally damage resistance 22 and inflict enfeebled 2 on triggering foe for 1 rd (foe's choice)
Instrument Of Zeal: Critical hit with Blade Of Justice or Retributive Strike inflicts +1 damage die and slowed 1 for 1 rd
Lasting Doubt: Effects of Glimpse Of Redemption linger at half intensity for 1 min
Liberating Stride: Target of Liberating Step may Stride half their Speed
Quick Shield Block: May use an additional Reaction for a Shield Block 1/turn
Radiant Blade Master: May choose dancing, greater disrupting, or keen property for Blade Ally
Radiant Blade Spirit: May choose flaming or anarchic, axiomatic, holy, or unholy property for Blade Ally
Ranged Reprisal: May make a Retributive Strike using a ranged Strike or a Step and a melee Strike
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Shield Of Grace: May suffer half of excess damage when using Shield Block to protect an ally
Shield Of Reckoning: (R) May apply Shield Block and Champion's Reaction with an ally
Shield Paragon: Shield is always raised and is automatically remade after 1 day if destroyed
Shield Warden: May use Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Shining Oath: Glimpse Of Redemption grants 27 damage resistance when used with undead
Smite Evil: (1) May have Blade ally inflict +4 HP good (master proficiency +6 HP) vs. target for 1 rd, extended as long as the target attacks an ally
Unimpeded Step: Liberating Step target may Step normally in any terrain
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Weight Of Guilt: May make Glimpse Of Redemption target stupefied instead of enfeebled
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +31 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Divine Will: Save Master (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Aura Of Courage: R15' Reduces value of frightened condition for self and allies by 1
Aura Of Life: R15' Grants resistance 5 to negative energy and +1 saves vs. necromancy
Aura Of Righteousness: R15' Grants resistance 5 to evil
Divine Health: +1 vs. disease/Successes vs. disease are critical successes
Divine Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Wyrmbane Aura: R15' Grants self and allies resistance 4 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison (resistance 10 from dragons)

Magic Notes:
Advanced Deity's Domain (Fate): Knows the Tempt Fate spell/+1 Focus Points
Champion Expertise: Spell Expert (Divine)
Champion Mastery: Spell Master (Divine)
Champion's Sacrifice: +1 Focus Points/Knows the Champion's Sacrifice spell
Deity's Domain (Fate): Knows the Read Fate spell
Devotion Spells: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Hero's Defiance: Knows the Hero's Defiance spell
Litany Against Sloth: +1 Focus Points/Knows the Litany Against Sloth spell
Litany Against Wrath: +1 Focus Points/Knows the Litany Against Wrath spell
Litany Of Righteousness: +1 Focus Points/Knows the Litany Of Righteousness spell
Supernatural Charm: May cast 1st level Charm 1/day
Affliction Mercy: Lay On Hands may also counteract a curse, disease, or poison
Anchoring Aura: R15' Aura counteracts teleportation spells cast by fiends
Deity And Cause: Has access to Mindlink, Ghostly Weapon, Phantasmal Killer spells
Devoted Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Greater Mercy: Lay On Hands may also counteract blinded, deafened, sickened, or slowed
Heal Mount: Lay On Hands on mount restores 10 Hit Points +10 Hit Points/heightened level
Incredible Investiture: May invest 12 items
Liberator: Knows the Lay On Hands spell
Mercy: (1) Lay On Hands may also counteract choice of fear or paralysis
Paladin: Knows the Lay On Hands spell
Redeemer: Knows the Lay On Hands spell
Ultimate Mercy: May use Lay On Hands to restore life to a target who died in the previous rd
Vengeful Oath: May use Lay On Hands to inflict good damage on creatures seen harming innocents or good allies
Notes
Validation Errors:
Champion Cause Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
Champion Divine Ally Allocation: 2 available vs. 3 allocated
Champion-Liberator Selectable Feature: Requires alignment (currently Neutral Good) == 'Chaotic Good' and champion level (currently 20)
Champion-Paladin Selectable Feature: Requires alignment (currently Neutral Good) == 'Lawful Good' and champion level (currently 20)
